item.title: Love Is All You Need
item.description: Mandala Art with a concept of love. Swami was my inspiration and the colours were from the idea of colourful life. Colours describe joyfulness and happiness in one’s life. Mandala Art is something I’ve learn to be patience and manage my emotions. Thank you Gallery
